help-file.title: APOCALYPSE
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <room> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Generic
"Apocalypse" calls down the power of the four horsemen of death down upon all not grouped with the caster. Victims of this spell can suffer from a variety of nasty and unpredictable consequences should they fail to resist it.
